metadata.name: Be Prismatic
metadata.description:
I had been dreaming about taking pictures with my new drone. I drove to Rialto Beach in Washington State and set up the perfect spot to launch. As I was flying, I decided to fly it towards my friend carrying a rainbow umbrella.

As soon as the drone reached him, I started taking pictures of him holding the umbrella against the black sand beach as the background. The image was absolutely stunning and unique. It reminded me of how we each have our own uniqueness, even though we are all part of a larger group or society.

On that day, I learned an important lesson: no matter how similar we all look on the outside, each of us carries something that makes us truly unique from others. 

Be colorful â€¦ Be Prismatic.  

Artist: Charles Martinez

Title: Be Prismatic

Edition: OPEN

Location : Rialto Beach, WA

Year Created : Sept 2021

Size: 3296 x 4120

Gear : Mavic 2 Pro

Genre : Aerial Photography
